alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley; Wallowa County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 8:25AM PST until January 20 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze mainly in the sheltered valleys near or just north of Ladd and Pyles Canyons, and in the Wallowa Valley especially between Joseph and Enterprise and Wallowa Lake. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley and Wallowa County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Minor impacts expected as temperatures are hovering just near freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
